function.name: generate_story_universe
function.description: generate the name, description, and two fitting categories of a story universe.

name.description: The name of the generated story universe.

description.description: The description of the generated story universe. Follow the instructions provided to produce this description.

category_1.description: Given your created description, reduce this story universe to a fitting category (such as high fantasy, dark fantasy, cyberpunk, horror, etc.).

category_2.description: Given your created description, reduce this story universe to another fitting category (such as high fantasy, dark fantasy, cyberpunk, horror, etc.).
